title: Recomended item for zyra doran's ring (mage items) instead of spell theifs (support items)
body:
{{champion:143}} should have {{item:1056}} as a recommended start item she should not have {{item:3303}} she should have a full mage build like similar utility heavy mages such as {{champion:25}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:99}} ... even {{champion:161}} who has similar utility and therefore played as support. {{champion:74}} has the similar ability to proc spell theifs. heavy in utility and benefiting alot from poke {{champion:43}} benefits alot more from spell theifs.

-She has just as much damage as other utility mages and therefore should be respected as one. 
-she does not have much utility as a support (no shield like {{champion:25}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:61}} , no hard cc in comparison to {{champion:74}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:1}}.
-her snare (her main supporting ability) allows her target to be in place to be damaged by her plants.
- she brings high damage with good AP ratios and low utility and although according to http://www.nerfplz.com/2015/05/2015-champion-tier-list-solo-queue_31.html she does better as a support I believe she should be build as a mid laner.

replies.body: 2 aoe ccs (and a knockup IS a hard cc btw) is a lot more utility than lux or orianna. She also has much better base damage than most mages, which is why she can still be effective with limited gold unlike some of the other stuff you mentioned.

It is an ultimate though. Morgana has just as much utility ( blocking hard cc and snare) orianna has a knockup heimer has a stun)

 She has excellent  ap ratios

Lux also has a snare, slow and sheild zyra also is a really good pusher

Zyra has really strong damage if placed as Mage.
She a lot of CC to compensate for her really immobile state.

Basically if you're good enough with her mechanics you should play her as APC.
